extendedInfo.description: Quiz game Japan prefecture name.This education puzzle game to remember the name of the prefecture of Japan Prefecture location or by playing a puzzle.I have created a game that can be enjoyed.----*Have a problem with the app starting and staying blank with Samsung Galaxy S3.Work around by turning on Developer options and checking the box for 'Disable Hardware overlays'.*Support tablet.

reviews.title: its a quiz...
reviews.comment: but as an English reviewer, I\'m more interested in learning the kanji,etc... this is a quiz for learning locations and really only that. not a kanji quiz. my j wife got half of the answers wrong...
reviews.author: Joey Beaudette

reviews.title: Works perfectly!
reviews.comment: I love how the flawless menu effects and the coloring gives motivation to learn japanese even more!
reviews.author: Maru Laari

reviews.title: Doesn\'t display. :(
reviews.comment: Only shows a black screen when opening app. Sounds and all buttons work, but can\'t see anything. :(
reviews.author: Alvin L

reviews.title: Angelina
reviews.comment: So helpful and meaningful, +w/sense try this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I don\'t know all the
reviews.comment: Kanji but what I know made me really exited about this game. Thanks.
reviews.author: Stacy lynn
